diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Microcephalic osteodysplastic primordial dwarfism type II
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis was supported by the patient's severe short stature, absence of catch-up growth, microcephaly, intellectual disability, distinctive craniofacial features, and significant skeletal abnormalities. Genetic testing confirmed a pathogenic variant in the PCNT gene, further corroborating the diagnosis.
